T02TD3457E:112b-1: sarba satva ba sh'i ka ra na sa m'a dhi /
T02TD3457E:112b-3: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin /
T02TD3457E:112b-4: 'jam dpal mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3457E:112b-5: stong pa nyid bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ho:yig las bdag nyid bskyed de /
T02TD3457E:112b-6: chags pa chen po'i gzugs dkar dmar sgeg pa'i nyams 'bar ba rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3457E:112b-10: g-yas gur gum ltar dmar ba /
T02TD3457E:112b-11: rgyab padma r'a ga ltar dmar ba /
T02TD3457E:112b-13: rtsa ba'i phya gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD3457E:112b-14: phyi ma dag gis zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02TD3457E:112b-15: de bzhin du phyi ma dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD3457E:112b-16: yang de bzhin du phyi ma dag gis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD3457E:112b-17: de bzhin du cod pan dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3457E:112b-18: cod pan las 'od zer byung ste steng du song nas snang bar byas te mchog gi dmar po chen po'i skur ba lta'o //
T02TD3457E:113a-1: gi phyogs rnams su gnas pa rnams la dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i 'od zer gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gang nas rjes su chags pas rang gi dbang du gnas par yid kyis bsams nas de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3457E:113a-2: aom ma h'a r'a ga badzra r'a ga ya sarba satva na ho:de nas sems can thams cad nges par dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i nges pa shin tu bsgoms pas chags pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku'i mchog 'jam pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD3457E:113a-3: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so//
